education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

coverLetter:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer position at your company. I have been working as a software engineer for the past two years, and I have a strong track record of success in developing and maintaining software applications.

In my previous role at Acme Corporation, I was responsible for developing and maintaining a variety of software applications, including a customer relationship management system, a financial reporting system, and a mobile app. I have experience with a variety of programming languages, including Java, Python, C++, SQL, and NoSQL.

I am a highly motivated and results-oriented individual with a strong work ethic. I am also a team player and I am able to work effectively with others. I am confident that I have the skills and experience that you are looking for in a Software Engineer.

I am available for an interview at your earliest convenience. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Jane Doe
